    • Constructor Detail

      • FileDownloadThread

        public FileDownloadThread(java.lang.String filename,
                          UserBean user,
                          int popID,
                          boolean animals)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a thread to download and save a definition/population into a flip file
        Parameters:
        filename - : Name of the file
        user - : UserBean Object of the user that wants to download the selected population
        popID - : Identifier of the selected population. This value has to be > 0
        animals - : true, the animals of the selected population are also downloaded. Otherwise set it as false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        It runs a FileDownloadThread
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getRealFileName

        public java.lang.String getRealFileName()
        A file has two names, the real one defined by the user and the pseudo one that is concatenation of the real name, user's username and a random number
        Returns:
        The real name of the file

      • getPseudoFileName

        public java.lang.String getPseudoFileName()
        A file has two names, the real one defined by the user and the pseudo one that is concatenation of the real name, name of the user and a random number
        Returns:
        the pseudo-name of the file

      • deleteFile

        public void deleteFile()
        Delete file

      • getFile

        public PushFile getFile()
        A PushFile object is an object created after a population/definition is retrieved from database
        Returns:
        A PushFile Object, representing the file to be downloaded

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Set an update message. It sets a message to be sent to the user describing the status of the file download
        Parameters:
        msg - : String object

      • getStatus

        public boolean getStatus()
        Get status of file when it is being retrieved from database
        Returns:
        true if the file has been retrieved from database. Otherwise false

      • setThread

        public void setThread(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Set current thread in a web session variable. The name of the session variable is "PushFile"
        Parameters:
        request - : HttpServletRequest object
